sent.orig: It is suitable for microware oven, cooker, electric cooker and infrared cooker.
sent.trans: 微波炉、煤气炉、电炉、红外线炉均适用！

sent.orig: Singled bottom or capsuled bottom available, suitable for furnace, induction cooker, gas cooker and gas furnace.
sent.trans: 可加覆复合式导磁壶底，厚实平稳，电炉、电磁炉、煤气炉、天然气炉均可使用。

sent.orig: Next, the pan on the gas cooker and turn on the gas cooker.
sent.trans: 接下来，把平底锅放在煤气炉上并打开煤气。

sent.orig: The solar cooker never get that hot.
sent.trans: 太阳能灶不会到达如此高的温度。

sent.orig: We call this a gas cooker.
